content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.0.64″][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://bitcoindoubler.tech/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/affiliate.jpg” _builder_version=”3.0.64″][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|57px|0px” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.0.64″][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.64″]

Affiliate Program

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.64″]

Join our Affiliate Program and earn a 15% commission for each of your referral’s deposit. 

Your BTC address is your referral link to which you will get your payout instantly after your referral makes a deposit.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.64″]

Use the referral link in the following format:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”3.0.64″ custom_css_main_element=”text-align: center;||color: green;”]https://bitcoindoubler.tech/?ref=YourBitcoinAddress[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.0.47″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.64″ custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||”]


Here is an example of how our Affiliate Program works:


You advertise your referral link and someone visits our website. He makes an investment of 0.1 BTC, after which our system automatically sends you the referral commission to the BTC address which you have used in the link. Your payout in this case is 15% of 0.1 BTC which is 0.015 BTC. Yor referral gets his 0.2 BTC payout after 10 hours.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://bitcoindoubler.tech/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/wishpond-affiliates.png” _builder_version=”3.0.64″ max_width=”350px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
